{"id":298807462,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1580414974,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/298807462/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"9.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isToeplitzMatrix(vector<vector<int>>& M) {\n        int n = M.size();\n        int m = M[0].size();\n        //if( (m == 1) ^ (n == 1)) return 1;\n        bool ok = 1;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            int x = i;\n            int y = 0;\n            int curr = M[x][y];\n            while(++x < n && ++y < m){\n                ok&= (curr == M[x][y]);\n            }\n        }\n        for(int j=0;j<m;j++){\n            int x = 0;\n            int y = j;\n            int curr = M[x][y];\n            while(++x < n && ++y < m){\n                ok&= (curr == M[x][y]);\n            }\n        }\n        return ok;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix"}
